topics.body:
>be me
>55 years old
>there's a lot of bright lights, not sure what's going on
>my legs are in something tight, but I can't see what
>finally, everything dims
>bright lights again but not enough to blind me
>wiggle my toes
>it's a kart
>look around
>rainbows, rainbows everywhere
>even the ground is a huge ribboned rainbow
>hear a distant voice counting down
>other racers seem familiar...
>the cart jostles to life, trying to control it
>i fall off the rainbow a bunch of times, don't really mind it though
>i'm laughing a lot, this is fun
>i'm behind the other racers by a lot, but i finally finish my lap and brake
>everyone gets out of their karts
>slowly clapping
>there's only eleven of them but I swear that I can hear even more clapping from somewhere else, it's deafening but in a good way
>i look down at the earth from the road edge, and suddenly I can see them, all of them sitting at their couches with their friends and family, enjoying my product, laughing the same way I was in the kart
>some of them are crying
>i reach down
>"Please understand..."
>look at the road - it seems endless - and then to the other racers
>"I'm not ready to go quite yet."
>rev up my kart - I have all of the time in the world.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a3ea976368725feb000287#post_55a3ea976368725feb000287
It's not really an earned badge, it's just a thing where we can verify artists' identities offsite so that we don't have to keep contacting them if they want stuff taken down, etc. 
Also, recognition! There are a good few big artists on this site that have a linked tag and a badge.

To create a link go to "/user/links":/user/links.
